sentences.en: " I won't,'said Carrie, who was, nevertheless, complying against her will.
sentences.cn: “ 我不愿意, "嘉莉说, 可是她还是违心地坐了下来.

sentences.en: Although the market has been flat, residential property costs remain high. Nevertheless, the fall-off in demand has had an impact on resale values.
sentences.cn: 尽管市场一直疲软，房价持续偏高。然而需求的减少还是对二手房价格产生了影响。

sentences.en: He came over well — perhaps a little pompous, but nevertheless honest and straightforward.
sentences.cn: 他给人的印象很好，可能显得有点自大，不过还是很诚实和直率。

sentences.en: He nevertheless completed the film with breathtaking speed.
sentences.cn: 但他还是以惊人的速度拍完了这部电影。

sentences.en: His clothes are old and unfashionable, but nevertheless he has a real touch of class.
sentences.cn: 虽然他的衣服显得陈旧过时, 可是他看上去仍气度不凡.

sentences.en: Miracles are not generally regarded as magical. Nevertheless, they do partake of the same nature.
sentences.cn: 奇迹一般不会被认为是魔法使然，不过二者在本质上有点相似。

sentences.en: Most marriages fail after between five and nine years. Nevertheless, people continue to get married.
sentences.cn: 大部分婚姻在婚后第五至第九年间失败，然而，人们仍会选择结婚。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, it's good to know you've had good notices, even if you don't read them.
sentences.cn: 不过，即便你不看，知道有一些对你的好评也挺好。

sentences.en: Our defeat was expected but it is disappointing nevertheless.
sentences.cn: 我们的失败是意料中的事，尽管如此，还是令人失望。

sentences.en: So he said nothing . But he was in a fine rage, nevertheless.
sentences.cn: 他虽然没说什么, 却窝了一肚子的火.

sentences.en: The news may be unexpected; nevertheless, it is true.
sentences.cn: 这消息可能是出乎意料的, 然而是真实的.

sentences.en: The opening day of the battle was, nevertheless, accounted a success.
sentences.cn: 不过，开战的首日仍被认为是成功的。

sentences.en: We are going nevertheless we shall return.
sentences.cn: 我们要走了,不过我们还要回来.

sentences.en: What you said was true but nevertheless unkind.
sentences.cn: 你所说的都对,不过有点不客气.

sentences.en: What you said was true. It was, nevertheless, a little unkind.
sentences.cn: 你说的都是实话，只不过有点刻薄。

sentences.en: Whilst this might sound like a truism, it is nevertheless a crucial problem to address.
sentences.cn: 尽管这可能听起来像是老生常谈，但却是待解决的重要问题。

sentences.en: Without doubt , the national bourgeoisie tends to vacillate , but we should , nevertheless, make use of its positive side, uniting with it as well as struggling against it.
sentences.cn: 民族资产阶级 当然 是动摇的, 但是要利用它的积极的一面, 要有团结有斗争.

trans.tran_en: in spite of a fact that you have just mentioned
You use nevertheless when saying something that contrasts with what has just been said.
